title: Qarah Tappeh, Nir
text: Qarah Tappeh (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Qareh Tappeh) is a village in <a href="Dursun%20Khvajeh%20Rural%20District">Dursun Khvajeh Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Nir%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Nir%20County">Nir County</a>, <a href="Ardabil%20Province">Ardabil Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 88, in 26 families.
